welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Doha, Qatar! Get ready to be captivated by the city's modern skyline, rich cultural heritage, and world-class hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Doha has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Doha International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
